cards.rules_text:
Double strike
This creature can't block alone.
Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a source you control for the first time each turn, this creature pillages. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever it deals combat damage to a player this turn, you may remove one to draw a card.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from mana value 2 or greater. [i](This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with mana value 2 or greater..)[/i]
When enchanted creature deals damage, sacrifice this Aura.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A cold comfort, to push back the day's worries.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2, can't block, and can't be blocked.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Passage demands only suffering: enter with it, and none more shall be exacted.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one or both—
• Counter all abilities.
• Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The shortest, coldest days are home to the longest, warmest memories.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on it.
Remove two spore counters from this creature: Choose one—
• Create a 1/1 white Saproling creature token.
• Return a creature or artifact card with mana value 1 from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control, then remove any number of counters from among creatures you control. For each counter removed this way, add {R} and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“All things come to pass with time, but I want everything now, to be all mine.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks and isn't blocked, you may prevent all damage that creature would deal this turn.
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if damage was prevented this turn, add that much {C} and draw a card. You can cast only one more spell this turn.

cards.special_text:
I — Remove a counter from a permanent you control. You lose 1 life, then draw a card.
II — Put a lifelink counter and an indestructible counter on target creature you control, then sacrifice each other creature you control.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Obsessed with the promise of prophecy, Simul had little concern for the suffering wrought by each failed experiment.[/i]

cards.special_text:
If Ora, Unbridled would die as a creature, she becomes an Ora Planeswalker instead.
Whenever a source you control deals excess damage to a permanent, put a loyalty counter on Ora, Unbridled.

[level -2] Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

Whenever another planeswalker dies, you may have Simul, the Veil-Cursed copy one of its loyalty abilities by paying its costs. [i](This does not count towards her loyalty ability turn limit.)[/i]
[+X]: Sacrifice any number of planeswalkers with total loyalty X or greater.
[0]: Scry 2. You gain 2 life.
cards.rules_text2:
Put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to X target creatures, where X is your legacy. [i](Your legacy is the number of legendary permanents you control plus legends in your graveyard.)[/i]
Proliferate.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]To entice a spark to ignite, there are few tools more reliable than flint and steel. Pain comes close.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Autumnal Vale enters the battlefield tapped unless you control another Plains.
{T}: Add {W}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Autumnal Vale: Search your library for a basic Mountain card and a basic Forest card. Reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

Untap each permanent you control.
If {VG}{VG} or {VW}{VW} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card. [i]({VG} is mana from basic forests.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase.
If {VR} or {VW} was spent to cast this spell, each creature can't 
block more than once this turn.

cards.rules_text:
Trample, haste
Whenever Delving Nixie deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {1}{VG}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Delving Nixie. Otherwise, create a 3/1 green Ouphe creature token with trample and haste.

Earnest Vassal must be blocked if able.
{2}{R}: Earnest Vassal gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If {VR} was spent to activate this ability, it also gains menace until end of turn. [i]({VR} is mana from basic mountains.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Young enough to appreciate beauty; not yet old enough to appreciate fragility.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Harvest Sentinel costs {1} less to cast for each {VW} spent to cast it. [i]({VW} is mana from basic plains.)[/i]
Harvest Sentinel's power and toughness are each equal to the number of plains you control.
Trample, haste

Whenever a player attacks, for each favor counter you have, you may choose an attacking creature. Untap that creature and remove it from combat unless its controller pays {2}.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have no favor counters, pray.

Whenever Soldier Devout attacks, pray, then Soldier Devout deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of favor counters you have. [i](You get a favor counter. Spend six as a sorcery to create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Once the Hunt has claimed a victim's soul, the only mercy the empire tenders is death.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn. Then for each other instant spell, sorcery spell, or ability that targets only that creature, choose one.
• Choose new targets for that spell or ability.
• Copy that spell or ability.
cards.flavor_text: [i]He carries a yearning to be the best at his craft, and the conviction to make it so.[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Convicted[/i] — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, until end of turn, Trollsbane Punk has base power and toughness 3/3, gains hexproof, and becomes a Giant in addition to its other types.

Spend only blue mana on X.
X target creatures you control phase out. If X is 2, first put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures. [i](Treat those creatures and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until your next turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]In the kelp, louts and lovers alike find shelter.[/i]

cards.special_text:
Tidal [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, choose high or low tide. Each player tracks tide separately.)[/i]
High tide — Whenever Nippy Shoalsteer becomes blocked, distribute its +1/+1 counters among any number of attacking creatures you control.
Low tide — {T}: Add {GU}. When you spend this mana on a Fish, Leviathan, or Merfolk spell, put
a +1/+1 counter on Nippy Shoalsteer.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control scavenges for +1/+1 counters, create half that many 0/1 white Human creature tokens, rounded down.
{2}, Sacrifice another Human: Carrion Peddler gains trample until end of turn. You gain 3 life.

Deathtouch
When a creature scavenges Blighted Hunt, it gains deathtouch and haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Scavenge {BG} [i]({BG}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]

{2}{B}, Sacrifice a permanent: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the sacrificed permanent's mana value. Put one of those cards into your hand, then shuffle.
[i]Minimalist — [/i]Whenever another nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, Ritual Warden gains indestructible until end of turn.

[i]Minimalist[/i] — Whenever a nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 1 life. If Scarlet Crucible was that permanent, return a permanent card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: [i]No greater tonic of undeath exists than that which flows from the hearts of the living.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever Nunieve's Aspirant deals combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards. If you do, put that many cards minus one from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Many young Eliterates take the name as both tribute and promise—to become worthy of the legend's ancient sacrifice.[/i]

cards.special_text:
[i](As you complete a condition, decode it. After all are decoded, you solve the mystery and transform it.)[/i]
When Glint in the Depths enters the battlefield, create a 2/1 Frog Noble creature token and you gain 2 life.
A card is put into your graveyard from your library.
III — An Island or Swamp enters the battlefield under your control.
cards.rules_text2:
When this transforms into Celestial Sphere, exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
If you would draw a card, you may instead cast a copy of the exiled card. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text2: [i]The power of the sun in the web of its hand.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Motley Wayfinder enters the battlefield, surveil 1. If you lost life since your last turn, Motley Wayfinder explores instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It is said that the sun grants the frog its right to rule the Mere, but acolytes of the moon illuminate other truths.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Creatures have base power 0 until end of turn. You may put a stun counter on each attacking creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]As the sun and moon drown above, all of Mere lies still.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Scarwood Pilferer attacks, gain control of up to one target artifact. It loses all abilities.
{2}{U}: Exile target Equipment you control. Return it to the battlefield under your control and attached to Scarwood Pilferer.

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, you may attach this to it. If Grandfather's Blade is in your graveyard, instead return it to the battlefield and attach it to that creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The rusted blade hums with a familiar voice, long forgotten: “Awaken, my child.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Shuffle your hand into your library. For each card shuffled this way, you may reveal an instant or sorcery card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. End the turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Each card as willful as it is wondrous.[/i]

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R}.
{2}, {T}, Discard a card: Return Coven Café to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.rules_text: Target opponent discards two cards. Then if that player discarded fewer cards than colors of mana spent to cast this spell, you draw cards and gain life equal to the difference.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B}.

cards.flavor_text2: [i]A day's stress might be whisked away by a spell or potion, but tranquility and pleasant company heal more deeply.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or artifact spell, choose one—
• You gain 2 life and mill 2.
• Create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token with “This creature can't block.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]A dew-specked sprout of wonder, awaiting a spark of ambition to set her ablaze.[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, choose any number of target instant, sorcery, and/or artifact cards in your graveyard with total mana value X or less, where X is the combat damage dealt to players this turn. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

cards.rules_text:
Add two mana in any combination of colors.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Kiyomi the red lies dead; Kaede the green, empty. From two charred stones, one phoenix hatches.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever an enchantment card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{2}: Surveil 1, then sacrifice Tobi's Heart-Splinter. When you do, draw a card. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Target nonland, nonartifact permanent gains indestructible. You gain 2 life.
At the beginning of your next turn's end step, that permanent's controller sacrifices it. When they do, that player draws a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Carmine's embrace became the thread that held Tobi's heart together, however fleetingly.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, you may exert Lorelei. When you do, target creature attacks this combat if able. [i](An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)[/i]
{1}{U}, {T}: Create a token copy of each creature Lorelei blocked this turn.
cards.rules_text2: Exile target creature. For as long as it remains exiled, its owner may cast it. At the beginning of your next main phase, add mana equal to its mana cost.
cards.flavor_text2:
[i]“A spell is magic knotted, not consumed. If unraveled, its energy can be claimed anew.”
—Sybelle, to Lorelei of Hopetown[/i]

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]
Target nonland permanent phases out until this Saga leaves the battlefield.
Once this turn, if a creature you control would die, you may have it phase out instead.
Until your next turn, permanents phase in under your control.

cards.rules_text:
[i]({UP} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life. {BP} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)[/i]
Draw a card for each color of mana spent to cast this spell, then discard a card unless you lost life this turn.

{1}, {T}: Add {C}{U}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It remains unclear whether they were built to assist mages in war, or to repel them.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Eclipse [i](As this enters, phase it out, or phase out another creature you control until it leaves the battlefield. It gains that creature's abilities.)[/i]
If a triggered ability of this permanent would trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
cards.flavor_text: [i]When the chords of fate wear thin, she lends her voice; an echo of deeds not yet done.[/i]

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]
Search your library for three sorcery cards with mana value 3, exile them, then shuffle.
Cast a card exiled with this Saga without paying its mana cost, then any player may pay 4 life. If a player does, counter that spell.

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of each combat, you may put a stun counter on target land you control. If you do, until end of turn, it becomes a 3/2 Horror creature with vigilance that is still a land.
Sacrifice this enchantment: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
